::KitKat::

She nodded and sat down in the chair herself.  She offered the chair 
next to her for Aracnia to sit in. "Now then, you mentioned a 
possable allience between our two groups.  I hope that we can handle 
this in a civilized manner.  Unlike how the males do thing, I prefer 
to use the mind, not the muscle. I think one can get much more 
acomplished that way. Don't you think so Aracnia?"

She hoped to win Aracnia's confidence and learn as much as possable.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Cyber Claw
> 
> 
> 
> Cyber Claw sneared at Kit Kat. "I'll stand." She didn't know how 
much 
> more of this she could stand. He felt crowded and wanted to get 
away, 
> but if these fools could keep their distance, she would be fine.
